steps.title: Kill Hillock
steps.description: Kill Hillock at the end of the Twilight Strand

steps.title: Get Starting Gems
steps.description: Purchase Spectral Throw, Chance to Bleed and optional Corroded Blade from Tarkleigh

vendor.name: Chance to Bleed
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Spectral Throw for bleed damage

steps.gear_focus: Purchase Corroded Blade if needed, look for linked red sockets

steps.title: Add Volley Support
steps.description: Add Volley or Momentum to Spectral Throw setup after Hailrake

vendor.name: Volley
vendor.usage_notes: Add to Spectral Throw for better coverage (or use Momentum)

steps.gear_focus: Look for 3+ linked weapon with red sockets

steps.title: Get Frostblink
steps.description: Purchase Frostblink and optionally Blood and Sand after reaching Level 8

vendor.name: Frostblink
vendor.usage_notes: Replace Dash with Frostblink as movement skill

vendor.name: Blood and Sand
vendor.usage_notes: Buy but do not enable until later

steps.gear_focus: Need blue socket for Frostblink, check vendor for Lapis Amulet

steps.title: Get Leap Slam
steps.description: Complete The Caged Brute for Leap Slam and add supports

vendor.name: Faster Attacks
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Leap Slam for speed

vendor.name: Momentum
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Leap Slam for movement

steps.gear_focus: Need GGR linked item for Leap Slam setup
steps.currency_notes: Keep upgrading weapon as you find better ones

steps.title: Get Sunder & Core Gems
steps.description: Purchase Sunder, Ruthless, War Banner, Precision, and Intimidating Cry after Fairgraves

vendor.name: Sunder
vendor.usage_notes: Replace Spectral Throw as main damage skill

vendor.name: Ruthless
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Sunder for damage (if you have 3R links)

vendor.name: War Banner
vendor.usage_notes: Activate for accuracy and physical damage

vendor.name: Precision
vendor.usage_notes: Activate for accuracy until Precise Technique

vendor.name: Intimidating Cry
vendor.usage_notes: Use before attacks for double damage

steps.gear_focus: Switch to Sunder, need 2H Axe or Mace, 3R linked preferred
steps.currency_notes: Focus on weapon upgrades for damage

steps.title: Get Herald of Ash & Blood Rage
steps.description: Get Herald of Ash from Intruders in Black, purchase Blood Rage from Yeena

reward.name: Herald of Ash
reward.usage_notes: Activate for fire damage and overkill burn

vendor.name: Blood Rage
vendor.usage_notes: Activate for attack speed and life leech

steps.gear_focus: Look for 3+ linked weapons, prioritize 2H Axes

steps.title: Get Melee Physical Damage
steps.description: Get Melee Physical Damage or Close Combat from Sharp and Cruel quest

reward.name: Melee Physical Damage
reward.usage_notes: Link to Sunder for core physical damage support

vendor.name: Close Combat
vendor.usage_notes: Alternative to Melee Physical Damage if you need 2R1G setup

steps.gear_focus: Need 3+ linked weapon: Sunder + Melee Phys + Close Combat or Ruthless

steps.title: Get Auras Setup
steps.description: Purchase Vulnerability, Haste, and Pride after Tolman quest completion

reward.name: Pride
reward.usage_notes: Aura swap to Pride on bosses for damage

vendor.name: Vulnerability
vendor.usage_notes: Curse enemies for increased physical damage taken

vendor.name: Haste
vendor.usage_notes: Use when traveling between zones, swap to Pride for bosses

steps.gear_focus: Need mana reservation management, may need to disable Blood and Sand temporarily
steps.currency_notes: Allocate Weathered Hunter passive for Haste at level 24

steps.title: Get Determination
steps.description: Complete Lost in Love for Determination aura

reward.name: Determination
reward.usage_notes: Alternative to Haste for defense when traveling

steps.gear_focus: Aura management: Haste/Determination for travel, Pride for bosses
steps.currency_notes: Visit Siosa in Library after A Fixture of Fate for missing gems

steps.title: Get Advanced Supports
steps.description: Get Fist of War from Dialla and purchase utility gems

reward.name: Fist of War
reward.usage_notes: Add to Sunder 4-link for damage boost

vendor.name: Cast when Damage Taken
vendor.usage_notes: Link with Immortal Call for defense

steps.gear_focus: Final setup: Sunder + Melee Phys + Close Combat + Fist of War
steps.currency_notes: Major power spike with 4-link Sunder setup
